1 #include "ackermann_ekf/navsatfix_sensor.h"
2 
3 #include <geodesy/utm.h>
4 #include <geographic_msgs/GeoPoint.h>
5 #include <geometry_msgs/TransformStamped.h>
6 #include <string>
7 
8 namespace ackermann_ekf {
9 
10 NavSatFixSensor::NavSatFixSensor(SensorArray &sensor_array,
11  const XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue &params,
12  ros::NodeHandle &nh)
13  : Sensor(sensor_array, params) {
14  // Disallow measurements which cannot be measured by this sensor from beeing
15  // fused
16  measurement_.mask[Measurement::dx_dt] = false;
17  measurement_.mask[Measurement::dy_dt] = false;
18  measurement_.mask[Measurement::dz_dt] = false;
19  measurement_.mask[Measurement::d2x_dt2] = false;
20  measurement_.mask[Measurement::d2y_dt2] = false;
21  measurement_.mask[Measurement::d2z_dt2] = false;
22  measurement_.mask[Measurement::Roll] = false;
23  measurement_.mask[Measurement::Pitch] = false;
24  measurement_.mask[Measurement::Yaw] = false;
25  measurement_.mask[Measurement::droll_dt] = false;
26  measurement_.mask[Measurement::dpitch_dt] = false;
27  measurement_.mask[Measurement::dyaw_dt] = false;
28 
29  std::string topic = static_cast<std::string>(params["topic"]);
30 
31  ROS_INFO("Adding NavSatFix sensor on topic %s", topic.c_str());
32 
33  subscriber_ = nh.subscribe(topic, 10, &NavSatFixSensor::callback, this);
34 }
35 
36 void NavSatFixSensor::callback(const sensor_msgs::NavSatFix::ConstPtr &msg) {
37  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped transform;
38  if (!sensor_array_.get_transform(transform, msg->header)) {
39  // If no transform exists we cannot determine e.g. sensor position so we
40  // are forced to discard the measurement
41  return;
42  }
43 
44  this->set_sensor_position(transform);
45 
46  // Convert from latitude, longitude to UTM (Cartesian coordinates)
47  geographic_msgs::GeoPoint llh;
48  llh.latitude = msg->latitude;
49  llh.longitude = msg->longitude;
50  llh.altitude = msg->altitude;
51  geodesy::UTMPoint utm(llh);
52 
53  measurement_.z(Measurement::X) = utm.easting;
54  measurement_.z(Measurement::Y) = utm.northing;
55  measurement_.z(Measurement::Z) = utm.altitude;
56 
57  const int XYZ[3] = {Measurement::X, Measurement::Y, Measurement::Z};
58  for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++) {
59  measurement_.R(XYZ[i / 3], XYZ[i % 3]) = msg->position_covariance[i];
60  }
61 
62  measurement_.time = msg->header.stamp.toSec();
63 
64  sensor_array_.process_measurement(measurement_);
65 }
66 
67 } // namespace ackermann_ekf
